title: Yummy grilled Patin with black bean sauce
description: First time eat Patin fish. Choose grilled Patin fish with black bean sauce was yummy but service was average.

title: Excellent food and service crew
description: We were very pleased to have our dinner here. The food was delicious  portions sufficient and waiting time for the grilled fish and dishes was around 10 mins upon ordering. They serve non spicy grilled fish too. The service crew were helpful and friendly. We

title: very different to the steamed fish we are used to in Southern China/ Cantonese cuisine
description: The restaurant is run efficiently food arrived quickly and is cooked well. As long as you mark in the fact that Singaporeans rarely expect you to tip over the service charge (many countries do) you should be able to stomach the small price they charge

title: Great tasting pomfret!
description: This is my favourite hangout with friends and family. I love their spicy Mala pomfret best (always so fresh) topped with beancurd skin  sotong balls  meatballs and golden mushroom. Another of my favourite side dish - pancakes!!! Don’t miss that!

title: Good fish
description: The best fish stew I ever eat. I ordered we bass fish with super spicy level. The soup was great and the fish so fresh. Really enjoyed some here. Should try when visit raffles city Singapore.

title: Great-tasting fish  fast service
description: Genuine Chinese flavors  and really good fish. You order on an iPad and the service is really fast. I can recommend the dishes for 2 or more  which come on a plate and continues being grilled on your table while you eat. The "Signature Fragrant"

title: First meal in SG
description: First meal in Singapore which is average only. The only amazing thing is ordering food from iPad which is very convenience. If you ask for warm water  they will charge you SGD0.50 For the wet tissue  they will charge you SGD0.30

title: Super Spicy "Signature" Dish
description: The staff was helpful & efficient. We tried the "Signature" dish with spicy mala sauce. The waitress warned us about the the sauce being very spicy  but we thought that we would be able to mange it if we ask for "less spicy". WRONG! It

title: Interesting fish & delicious chilled la mian
description: The serving of the fish looks big because the fish is sliced into two and laid flatten on the grilled. Even though we had requested for less spicy  it is still very spicy and challenging  exactly like mala. No free water  everything is charged. Crunchy

title: Nicely presented fish meals
description: Specialises in large fish meals. Nice presentation  guite hot/spicy. Somewhat varying quality  but quite good if you are into this kind of food. Ended up eating there several times.

title: Tasty and Authentic
description: We tried this dish several times during our visit to Guangzhou last year and thoroughly enjoyed the chili and spicy taste. Then we chanced upon Riverside Grilled Fish in Raffles City. We ordered the standard fish with enoki mushrooms and lotus root as add on.

title: Not bad
description: An interesting experience where you chose your dishes from an I pad. We chose the option of not so spicy fish which was more than enough for most western palates. The fish was nice but a bit overdone. That was compensated for by the excellent

title: Delicioius Chinese Food
description: Very near City Hall MRT station. You can get a very good Chinese food. Easy to order and fast to get it. Very clean and tidy restaurant with professional staff. Strongly recommended.

title: Excellent Szechuan Experience
description: Come for more than the fish! While visiting Singapore  we stopped into this restaurant since we found it to be more interesting than the Din Tai Fung at the end of the hall. Since we like spicier foods  we found ourselves more or less in

title: Not my choice again
description: We were looking for a nice decent lunch and wanted to go to Din Tai Fung  but the line was too long . Next door looked very appealing and lots of seats were available so we decided to give it a try. But it was

title: Nice grilled fish!
description: Riverside Grilled Fish - This restaurant is an offshoot from the branches in China  and the standards hold up pretty well. This was our second trip and the grilled fish of seabass in 'fragrant sauce' doesn't disappoint. We also managed to tried the 腊味炒饭 and

title: VERY GOOD FOOD
description: Very Asian very authentic excellent service and friendly staff I think we were the only non-Asians in the restaurant but the staff were very friendly and helpful

title: Let have lunch
description: Visit the outlet over weekend. Was surprised not to see a crowd for lunch. Maybe already was late at 1pm. Am glad to try out the restaurant as the food especially the grilled fish was very good and authentic. But for those who can't takr

title: Delicious food Fast service
description: The signature spicy grilled fish tasted really good. We are glad we asked for less spicy and it came out just right. Otherwise it may be overpowering for some. This dish goes very well with steamed or fried rice. The braised chicken dish was also

title: Riverside Restaurant not in Riverside
description: It is nice try having lunch ordering spicy noodle with beef. Beef is well cooked and tender but Chinese spice taste is abit not my type. Charge for water although they are charging for service charges and I don't find any services rather than having

title: Great fish  chicken and duck
description: Ate with two friends at Riverside grilled fish. All the dishes looked great around us and we very much enjoyed our own dishes (duck  chicken and fish). The rice was awesome too.

title: Chinese Chauvinist Restaurant with Mediocre Food
description: The menus here are 95% in Chinese  so if you don't read Chinese  the prose written on each dish will go way over your heads. The staff aren't good at translating each of the items from Chinese. I liked the sunflower seeds they served as

title: Novel meal at the one and only outlet in Singapore
description: This was a pleasantly surprising delicious meal with a twist. The fish was great  containing surprises underneath. The sauce was a great complement to the fried rice with vegetables we had. We will be back soon!
